@brant_robertson @ucsc It's a bit obvious that it is in the past!  People who are still being harmed rarely tweet about it, with the important exception of people who have a huge twitter following because of their wide-flung & effective outreach efforts.
@rittenhousewest @ucsc Thanks, it’s in the past now. I appreciate the reply, though.

@brant_robertson @ucsc I never ever would have guessed. I'm glad you wrote this & very sorry it happened to you.  I know bullying is awful for everyone but especially being a father to 3 little ones it makes me angry that it happened to you.  (I'm involved in a SkypeAScientist with 8th grade triplets!)
@brant_robertson @HarmitMalik @ucsc Academic bullies are the worst. I’m glad you found a better place.
@zursch @pattonoswalt @ucsc Crown would work better—Rutherford, Galileo, Galen, and so on.
@dougom @pattonoswalt @ucsc Right? "Casa Primera" at Stevenson wouldn't be a great Republican name.
@pattonoswalt The dorms at Merrill College at @ucsc are lettered; A, B, C, and D.

GGWP All❗️❗️

@BCDreyer @ucsc I realize it’s not theater per se, but it was a truly remarkable experience. A performer wove his spell, and the audience was ensorcelled. I’ve never forgotten, not 35 years later, that dead silence, those seconds of total awe, so much more impressive than immediate applause.

@BCDreyer A senior recital at @ucsc. One performer was a classical guitarist who played a Bach piece. It started slow & moved into a fast, intricate part that, well, totally rocked. He ended & there were 5 or so seconds of dead silence before the audience *exploded*. It was remarkable.

Actions in RL & Valorant❗️❗️

Our RL Team is playing in @CollegiateRL Star League against @umontana Silver

Our RL Green is playing in @CollegiateRL Open League against @WWU Gray

Our Valorant team is playing in @CollegeVALORANT against @ucsc Esports

All matches start at 1PM MST

@ucsc @SFdirewolf @IasUcsc This was so good. I'm grateful to have been able to attend this talk. I look forward to the rest of them!
This live stream and Angela Davis' wisdom is life-giving when most academic spaces for me are so oppressive. ❤️ Thanks to the organizers at @ucsc for sharing this event online.
I loved listening to the @ucsc  conversation between Angela Davis and Gina Dent, faciliated by Rachel Nelson. Hearing Angela note the role of racial capitalism and ... cont..
@ucsc As a FMST department alum, I cannot overstate how incredible these two women are, and how they fundamentally changed my worldview. Absolutely recommend tuning into this.
@ucsc @IasUcsc So excited !🤍

@_david_ho_ @ScottDoney1 @co2ley @OurOcean @ShallinB @NOAAResearch @OA_NOAA @NOAAFisheries @NOAA @KristyKroeker @ucsc @uvaevsc @ResilienceUVA @vcrlter @BatsBermuda I had the same feeling about our Chapter in the @IPCC_CH #SROCC

@ScottDoney1 @co2ley @OurOcean @ShallinB @NOAAResearch @OA_NOAA @NOAAFisheries @NOAA @KristyKroeker @ucsc @uvaevsc @ResilienceUVA @vcrlter Congratulations! Don’t you wish you could have included the new @BatsBermuda data in Figure 1?

@gpk320 @ScottDoney1 @froeltho @OurOcean @ShallinB @NOAAResearch @OA_NOAA @NOAAFisheries @NOAA @KristyKroeker @ucsc @uvaevsc @ResilienceUVA @vcrlter Unfortunately we were LIMITED by journal format on how many papers we were allowed to cite. Could have cited many many more!

@ScottDoney1 @froeltho @co2ley @OurOcean @ShallinB @NOAAResearch @OA_NOAA @NOAAFisheries @NOAA @KristyKroeker @ucsc @uvaevsc @ResilienceUVA @vcrlter ... And there's had been a lot of work done already, with well more than 100 papers cited.
@SeabirdResearch @SEG_UL @ucsc @NOAAFisheries Thanks @SeabirdResearch, hope you're well!

@ScottDoney1 @froeltho @co2ley @OurOcean @ShallinB @NOAAResearch @OA_NOAA @NOAAFisheries @NOAA @KristyKroeker @ucsc @uvaevsc @ResilienceUVA @vcrlter Rapidly reading this as a non-biologist, I get this:
* Effects are not uniformly bad, and species and ecosystems may partially adapt, but
* Acidification is driving lots of ecosystem changes.
* Reefs and shelled species most vulnerable, algae least
* We're still learning.
